dmca.title: Copyright and Trademark claims
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Intellectual Property LVMH FASHION GROUP [mailto:ipd@fr.lvmh-fashion.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 17, 2006 11:58 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Copyright and Trademark claims
Subject: Copyright and Trademark claims
Importance: High



(See attached file: C&D ISP HotSportShoe_com.pdf)

Chris Newcomb
Everyones Internet Ltd
390 Benmar Suite 200
Houston, Texas 77060
USA


10/17/2006

BY EMAIL (dmca@ev1.net)

Re: Copyright and Trademark claims - HotSportShoe.com

To Chris Newcomb :

I am legal counsel for the French company LOUIS VUITTON MALLETIER ("Vuitton"), the
owner of the exclusive right to use federally registered Vuitton Trademarks: "LV"
(application No. 726.741), "Louis Vuitton"
(application No. 60.441), "Floral Device" (application No. 407.999), among others
(hereinafter referred to as the " Vuitton Trademarks"). In addition, Vuitton is the
owner of certain copyrights protected in the United States by copyright
registrations: VA-1-225-388; VA-1-225-389; VA-1-225-390; VA-1-225-391, VA
1-250-121-and VA 1-250-120.

We hereby notify you that your company is currently providing hosting services to
the web site HotSportShoe.com -
http://www.hotsportshoe.com/product.asp?sort_id=71&nsort_id=383 and that THIS SITE
INFRINGES UPON VUITTON'S TRADEMARKS AND COPYRIGHTS in violation of both the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and the Trademark Act of 1946 (15 U.S.C.
